channel.title: SpliceScape Release :)
channel.description:
I'll list a few features then post the advertisement post I used below. Don't like it? I don't care (h)
What have I changed from PI?
-Infernal mages actually mage -All Godwar Drops done -Godwars is multi -Real Godwar Maps -KBD in wilderness -All dragons use dragon breath -Dragonfire Shield immunes you from it completely but normal anti ones just decrease damage -Dark Bow special, real graphics -Dragon 2H Special (Needs fixing) -My basic clue scrolls are there -Ermm, some shit items on death interface -All men and women can be pickpocket (Yeah, I'm listening utter crap now) -All dupes that I know of are fixed :) -A bad version of the warriors guild has been added -G Maul special fixed. -Click combat tabs to find stats and slayer tab to find task. -Pimped up the farming and something else which I can't remember...
We've had a couple of updates the past few days and I'm just going to name and show a few:
[b][u]Infernal Mages now actually use magic![/u][/b] [url=http://tinypic.com/r/2411pag/4]Click here to see![/url]
[b][u]Dragonfire Shield Immune to Dragonfire![/u][/b] [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/updatedfs.jpg?t=1282882655[/img]
[b][u]Combat Skills Have Quick Chat! Click combat tab[b][/u] [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/QC.jpg?t=1282882840[/img]
[b][u]Find out how many slayer monsters left to kill! Click Slayer Tab[b][/u] [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/slayer.jpg?t=1282882928[/img]
[b][u][SIZE="7"]SpliceScape: The Return[/SIZE] [/u][/b]
[img]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s105/sabastian422/splicebanner3.png[/img] [img]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s105/sabastian422/Splicebanner2.png[/img] [img]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x22/jayiszebest/SS2.jpg[/img]
Quick Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KwmUXovZG4Q]YouTube - The return of Fallen X Bow (Kind of...)[/url]
Newly added Clue Scrolls!
SpliceScape is now online! You could say that it is back, most of you won't recognise us but if anyone does don't be shy to let me know if you're from one of the old servers.[GOOGLE][/GOOGLE]
This sever will be tough, I'm not going to lie. It will be an economy driven server so that means getting your skill levels up will count for something. To all of you who dare to take on this challenges, welcome and good luck! Don't expect any free items or easy way out of just buying items in shops, you really must earn them.
Just the same as before except it was auto kicking some people and not working on Windows 7, fixed that and changed the Lock icon to items on death. [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/itemondeath.jpg?t=1283653239[/img]
Check out our unique home! You'll have a new home to explore and a new experience [b]Home[/b] [SPOIL] [b]Home[/b] Pink Rectangle - Godwar Portals Blue Rectangle - Prayer Altar Yellow Rectangle - Starting Area [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/NARDAH.jpg[/img][/SPOIL]
[b]Features:[/b] [SPOIL]Features:
* 4 different PK teleports, very easy to be located, just by a click of your mouse :)
pking places such as:
* Varrock Wild for multi combat * Edgeville wild for single combat * Obelisk (Level 44 Wilderness) * Mage Bank ( Deep wild )
Also we have 20 Working skills for all you people who aren't into pking people and want other ways of to get your gear and become the richest.
Skills: * Theiving - Steal from the stall and sell to the NPC located close by * Mining * Fishing * Cooking * woodcutting * Farming * Runecrafting * Agility * Fletching * Smithing * Herblore * Crafting
For all the players who are looking for a challenge we have all sorts of bosses in their real maps!:
* Godwars - 4 portals which are colour coded:(These all drop items!) Blue - Saradomin Red - Zamorak Green - Bandos Orange - Armadyl
* King Black Dragon * Dagannoths, require 2 people to open the entrance * Chaos Elemental and more coming soon
In addition we have mini games such as:
* Barrows * Pest control * Tzaar fight pits * Duel arena
Other
* Working Vengeance * All dragons require a shield to avoid being hit by dragonbreath [/SPOIL]
Here are some images and gifs: [SPOIL] ZGS Spec [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/ZGS.gif[/img] SGS Spec [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/SGS.gif[/img] AGS Spec [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/AGS.gif[/img] BGS Spec [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/BGS.gif[/img] Vengeance [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/Veng.gif[/img] Dragon Bolts [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/cbow.gif[/img] Darkbow Spec [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/darkbow.gif[/img] Barrows [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/Barrow.gif[/img] Equiptment | Donator Pack | Lock XP [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/THING.jpg[/img] Clan chat [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/clan.jpg[/img] Prayer [img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/Chivalry.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Splice/portals.jpg?t=1282601001[/img] [/SPOIL]
DONATORS SPECIAL STUFF AND CLUE SCROLLS
[SPOIL][IMG]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/Donators.jpg?t=1283213316[/img][/SPOIL]
Here is some information about gaining items: [SPOIL]Certain items. DDS - Chaos Dwarf Magic Bow and arrows higher than rune - Fletched Fury Amulet, Berserker, Archer and Mage Ring - Dagganoth Kings
All Godwar Bosses drop their assigned Godsword hilt and shards.[/SPOIL]
Unique home, many features, constantly trying to improve. Join us now! I hope you all enjoy the server! Slate me as much as you want, just have fun :awesome:
Server Download Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/ntb7z4yztzjlphg/SpliceScape%20Release.rar]SpliceScape Release.rar[/url] Client Download Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/db8owdfmm1bg4v0/SpliceScape%20Client%20V1%20%28Admin%29.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/db8owdfmm1bg4v0/SpliceScape%20Client%20V1%20%28Admin%29.rar[/url]
Credits:
Sanity 80% Rene & Valentino 14% Community for tutorials 5% Me 1%

item.title: SpliceScape Release :)
item.dc:creator: @Xyger Xyger
item.description:
@Xyger wrote:

I’ll list a few features then post the advertisement post I used below. Don’t like it? I don’t care (h)

What have I changed from PI?

-Infernal mages actually mage
-All Godwar Drops done
-Godwars is multi
-Real Godwar Maps
-KBD in wilderness
-All dragons use dragon breath
-Dragonfire Shield immunes you from it completely but normal anti ones just decrease damage
-Dark Bow special, real graphics
-Dragon 2H Special (Needs fixing)
-My basic clue scrolls are there
-Ermm, some shit items on death interface
-All men and women can be pickpocket (Yeah, I’m listening utter crap now)
-All dupes that I know of are fixed
-A bad version of the warriors guild has been added
-G Maul special fixed.
-Click combat tabs to find stats and slayer tab to find task.
-Pimped up the farming and something else which I can’t remember…

We’ve had a couple of updates the past few days and I’m just going to name and show a few:

Infernal Mages now actually use magic!
Click here to see!

Dragonfire Shield Immune to Dragonfire!

[b]Combat Skills Have Quick Chat! Click combat tab[b]

[b]Find out how many slayer monsters left to kill! Click Slayer Tab[b]

[SIZE=“7”]SpliceScape: The Return[/SIZE]

splicebanner3.png800×120

Splicebanner2.png800×120

SS2.jpg800×120

Quick Video: YouTube - The return of Fallen X Bow (Kind of…)

Newly added Clue Scrolls!

SpliceScape is now online! You could say that it is back, most of you won’t recognise us but if anyone does don’t be shy to let me know if you’re from one of the old servers.[GOOGLE][/GOOGLE]

This sever will be tough, I’m not going to lie. It will be an economy driven server so that means getting your skill levels up will count for something. To all of you who dare to take on this challenges, welcome and good luck! Don’t expect any free items or easy way out of just buying items in shops, you really must earn them.

Just the same as before except it was auto kicking some people and not working
on Windows 7, fixed that and changed the Lock icon to items on death.

Check out our unique home! You’ll have a new home to explore and a new experience
Home
[SPOIL]
Home
Pink Rectangle - Godwar Portals
Blue Rectangle - Prayer Altar
Yellow Rectangle - Starting Area
[/SPOIL]

Features:
[SPOIL]Features:

  • 4 different PK teleports, very easy to be located, just by a click of your mouse

pking places such as:

  • Varrock Wild for multi combat
  • Edgeville wild for single combat
  • Obelisk (Level 44 Wilderness)
  • Mage Bank ( Deep wild )

Also we have 20 Working skills for all you people who aren’t into pking people and want other ways of to get your gear and become the richest.

Skills:

  • Theiving - Steal from the stall and sell to the NPC located close by
  • Mining
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • woodcutting
  • Farming
  • Runecrafting
  • Agility
  • Fletching
  • Smithing
  • Herblore
  • Crafting

For all the players who are looking for a challenge we have all sorts of bosses in their real maps!:

  • Godwars - 4 portals which are colour coded:(These all drop items!)
    Blue - Saradomin
    Red - Zamorak
    Green - Bandos
    Orange - Armadyl

  • King Black Dragon

  • Dagannoths, require 2 people to open the entrance

  • Chaos Elemental
    and more coming soon

In addition we have mini games such as:

  • Barrows
  • Pest control
  • Tzaar fight pits
  • Duel arena

Other

  • Working Vengeance
  • All dragons require a shield to avoid being hit by dragonbreath
    [/SPOIL]

Here are some images and gifs:
[SPOIL]
ZGS Spec

SGS Spec

AGS Spec

BGS Spec

Vengeance

Dragon Bolts

Darkbow Spec

Barrows

Equiptment | Donator Pack | Lock XP

Clan chat

Prayer


[/SPOIL]

DONATORS SPECIAL STUFF AND CLUE SCROLLS

[SPOIL][/SPOIL]

Here is some information about gaining items:
[SPOIL]Certain items.
DDS - Chaos Dwarf
Magic Bow and arrows higher than rune - Fletched
Fury Amulet, Berserker, Archer and Mage Ring - Dagganoth Kings

All Godwar Bosses drop their assigned Godsword hilt and shards.[/SPOIL]

Unique home, many features, constantly trying to improve. Join us now!
I hope you all enjoy the server! Slate me as much as you want, just have fun :awesome:
